content:
RibbonGalleryItem Class

Definition

Represents an individual item of a RibbonGallery that is used in a Ribbon control.

In this Article

public class RibbonGalleryItem : System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

KeyTip

Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.

public string KeyTip { get; set; }
Value
String

The keyboard shortcut for the control. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.

KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key.

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field KeyTipProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

Ribbon

Gets a reference to the Ribbon that this control belongs to.

public System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon Ribbon { get; }
Value
Ribbon

A reference to the Ribbon that this control belongs to. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

This property is set on the parent Ribbon control and is inherited by the child controls. It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the Ribbon class.

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field RibbonProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

ToolTipDescription

Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.

public string ToolTipDescription { get; set; }
Value
String

The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Warning

Each ribbon control inherits a ToolTip property. If the ToolTip property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field ToolTipDescriptionProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

OnActivatingKeyTip(ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs)

Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.

protected virtual void OnActivatingKeyTip (System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs e);
e
ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs

Contains data about the activation.

OnCreateAutomationPeer()

Creates a new RibbonGalleryItemAutomationPeer object for this control.

protected override System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer OnCreateAutomationPeer ();
Returns
AutomationPeer

A new automation peer object for this control.

OnGotKeyboardFocus(KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the GotKeyboardFocus routed event.

protected override void OnGotKeyboardFocus (System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e);
e
KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method sets the IsHighlighted property to true when this control gets keyboard focus.

This implementation marks the GotKeyboardFocus event as handled by setting the Handled property of the event data to true.

OnKeyDown(KeyEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the KeyDown routed event.

protected override void OnKeyDown (System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e);
e
KeyEventArgs

The event data.

OnKeyTipAccessed(KeyTipAccessedEventArgs)

Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.

protected virtual void OnKeyTipAccessed (System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipAccessedEventArgs e);
e
KeyTipAccessedEventArgs

Contains data about the activation.

OnKeyUp(KeyEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the KeyUp routed event.

protected override void OnKeyUp (System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e);
e
KeyEventArgs

The event data.

OnLostKeyboardFocus(KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the LostKeyboardFocus routed event.

protected override void OnLostKeyboardFocus (System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e);
e
KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method sets the IsPressed and IsHighlighted properties to false when this control loses keyboard focus.

This implementation marks the LostKeyboardFocus event as handled by setting the Handled property of the event data to true.

OnMouseLeave(MouseEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the MouseLeave routed event.

protected override void OnMouseLeave (System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e);
e
MouseEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method sets the IsHighlighted and IsPressed properties to false when the mouse pointer leaves this control.

This implementation marks the MouseLeave event as handled by setting the Handled property of the event data to true.

OnMouseLeftButtonDown(MouseButtonEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the MouseLeftButtonDown routed event.

protected override void OnMouseLeftButtonDown (System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e);
e
MouseButtonEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method sets the IsHighlighted property to true. If the mouse button is pressed, it also sets the IsPressed property to true.

This implementation marks the MouseLeftButtonDown event as handled by setting the Handled property of the event data to true.

OnMouseLeftButtonUp(MouseButtonEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the MouseLeftButtonUp event.

protected override void OnMouseLeftButtonUp (System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e);
e
MouseButtonEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method sets the IsPressed property to false when the left mouse button is released over this control.

This implementation marks the MouseLeftButtonUp event as handled by setting the Handled property of the event data to true.

OnMouseMove(MouseEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the MouseMove event.

protected override void OnMouseMove (System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e);
e
MouseEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method manages the focus and highlighting of the gallery item when the mouse moves over it.

This implementation marks the MouseMove event as handled by setting the Handled property of the event data to true.

OnSelected(RoutedEventArgs)

Raises the Selected routed event.

protected virtual void OnSelected (System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e);
e
RoutedEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method is called when IsSelected property changes to true.

OnUnselected(RoutedEventArgs)

Raises the Unselected routed event.

protected virtual void OnUnselected (System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e);
e
RoutedEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This method is called when IsSelected property changes to false.

Events

Selected

Occurs when the stem.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected* property of the item changes to true.

public event System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler Selected;

Unselected

Occurs when the stem.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected* property of the item changes to false.

public event System.Windows.RoutedEventHandler Unselected;
